channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Man guilty of murdering woman and three children in Bradford arson attack
item.description: Sharaz Ali, 40, was motivated by jealousy and fuelled by drugs and alcohol when he set fire to house, jury heard A man who set fire to a house killing...

item.title: Venezuelan Nobel peace prize winner on way to Oslo but will miss ceremony
item.description: Norwegian Nobel Institute says María Corina Machado is ‘safe’ and her daughter will receive award on her behalf Europe live – latest updates The Nobel...

item.title: María Corina Machado ‘safe’ and ‘will be’ in Oslo, Nobel committee says as she misses peace prize ceremony – Europe live
item.description: Peace prize winner Machado has been seen only once in public since going into hiding in August last year Jørgen Watne Frydnes, chair of the Norwegian ...

item.title: British soldier, 28, killed on duty in Ukraine named as L/Cpl George Hooley
item.description: Parachute regiment soldier died in ‘tragic accident’ not thought to be result of hostile fire A British soldier killed on duty in Ukraine has been nam...

item.title: Starmer faces Badenoch at PMQs after calling on Europe to curb joint human rights laws – UK politics live
item.description: PM facing questions from Tory leader and other MPs in the Commons Reeves is now being asked about the leak to the Financial Times on 13 November sayin...

item.title: Nobel Peace Prize winner will be in Oslo but won't make awards ceremony
item.description: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, who lives in hiding, is reportedly safe and on her way to Oslo.

item.title: British paratrooper who died in Ukraine named
item.description: Lance Corporal George Hooley was named by Sir Keir Starmer in the Commons during PMQs.

item.title: Man guilty of murdering ex-girlfriend's sister and three children in house fire
item.description: Bryonie Gawith and her children Denisty, Oscar and Aubree Birtle died in their home in Bradford.

item.title: McDonald's pulls AI Christmas ad after backlash
item.description: McDonald's said the moment served as "an important learning" as it explored "the effective use of AI".

item.title: 'A sense of panic' - what's going on in Turkish football?
item.description: A wide-ranging investigation into illegal gambling involving figures in Turkish football is underway with hundreds of players, club owners and referee...
